titles.title: A bill to amend chapters 83 and 84 of title 5, United States Code, to extend the civil service retirement provisions of such chapter which are applicable to law enforcement officers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14706)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/29/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal law to extend certain retirement-related provisions of the Civil Service and Federal Employees' Retirement Systems for Federal law enforcement officers to law enforcement officers of the Refuge Division of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service of the Department of the Interior.
